title: SET_VEHICLE_WHEEL_WIDTH
content:
0x64C3F1C0// SetVehicleWheelWidth
BOOL SET_VEHICLE_WHEEL_WIDTH(Vehicle vehicle, float width);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle to set data for.width: Width of the wheels (usually between 0.1 and 1.5 is reasonable).Returns: Bool - whether change was successful or notSets vehicle's wheels' width (width is the same for all the wheels, cannot get/set specific wheel of vehicle).
Only works on non-default wheels.
Returns whether change was successful (can be false if trying to set width for non-default wheels).
codeBlocks:
// SetVehicleWheelWidth
BOOL SET_VEHICLE_WHEEL_WIDTH(Vehicle vehicle, float width);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for SET_VEHICLE_WHEEL_WIDTH
SetVehicleWheelWidth(vehicle, 0.0)
